cause.description:
iSUPPORT
>Heterosexual >Bisexual >Homosexual >Transsexual >Asexual
Any type of sex should be supported, NO one should be discriminated against. It's just not right. It's wrong. What's wrong with you homophobics?
1. Gay rights should be allowed everywhere.
cause.mission: make people feel comfortable supporting any type of sexuality.
cause.name: iSUPPORT
